data.title: Entry Arrangements for Mainland, Macao, Taiwan & Overseas Chinese Residents
data.meta_description: Entry Arrangements for Mainland, Macao, Taiwan & Overseas Chinese Residents
data.text:
Visit/Transit For Taiwan residents currently in Taiwan -

ID 78D (single entry permit) or

ID78H (multiple entry permit)

“Guidance Notes” in respective application forms Visit/Transit For PRC passport holders and Taiwan residents currently living overseas -

ID 1003A &

ID 1003B

ID(C) 1004 (Chinese version) or

ID(E) 1004 (English version)

Top Talent Pass Scheme This application is available online only, please click here to submit application.

ID(E) 1026 (English version)

ID(E) 966 & ID(E) 968 (English version)

New Capital Investment Entrant Scheme This application is available online only, please click here to submit application. Please click here and refer to the “Rules for New Capital Investment Entrant Scheme”. Quality Migrant Admission Scheme This application is available online only, please click here to submit application.

ID(C) 982 (Chinese version) or
